content:
Excellent plan! Setting up a note for your shoes and adding the pairs you have will give you a great starting point. And don't forget to add those reminders, like returning the red high heels that didn't fit quite right. It's always a good feeling to get rid of shoes that don't fit or make you feel uncomfortable.

Remember, the key is to make the system work for you and your lifestyle. Don't be afraid to experiment and adjust as you go along. You might find that you need to add more columns or tags, or that you want to track additional information about your shoes.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy organizing, and I hope you enjoy your newly organized shoe collection!

(P.S. Don't forget to wear those new black and white sneakers again soon!)
